media:group.media:title: Spotlight: UWC Dilijan‚Äôs First Decade
media:group.media:description:
In this interview, Elisabet Engellau reflects on the 10-year journey of United World College in Dilijan, Armenia. She explores how this innovative institution is not only working to transform the educational landscape of Armenia but is also cultivating a new generation of global citizens poised to tackle world challenges. Engellau shares insights into UWC Dilijan's approach to international education, its impact on the local community, and its vision for the future.

entry.title: Small aviation takes off at Armenia‚Äôs Air Fest V

media:group.media:title: Small aviation takes off at Armenia‚Äôs Air Fest V
media:group.media:description:
Air Fest V brings together aviation enthusiasts from across the region and beyond to Yeghvard‚Äôs Sky Club Airfield, showcasing the potential of small aviation, using lightweight aircrafts designed for personal and recreational use, in Armenia. From air shows to panel discussions with experts, this annual event aims to raise public awareness and inspire future aviators. Learn how Armenia is developing this particular sector and why events like this are crucial for the region.

entry.title: Aurora launches first of its kind human rights and humanitarian forum new

media:group.media:title: Aurora launches first of its kind human rights and humanitarian forum new
media:group.media:description:
The Aurora Humanitarian Initiative, a nonprofit that seeks to address urgent humanitarian challenges around the world, launched a first-of-its-kind human rights and humanitarian forum in May, in partnership with the Promise Institute for Human Rights at the University of California, Los Angeles School of Law.
The program provides a platform for the world‚Äôs leading humanitarians to convene for a series of insightful discussions about the world‚Äôs most pressing humanitarian challenges. Noubar Afeyan, Co-Founder and Chair of the Aurora Board of Directors, launched the forum.
The 2024 Aurora Events, including the 2024 Aurora Prize Ceremony, were held on May 8-10 in Los Angeles, California.
